comments.body: When does the ledger produce this?

In theory it should never happen.
But we have to handle this case because of the type we receive, as the GRPC status is optional in the protobuf `Completion`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@      extends CompletionFailure
  final case class TimeoutResponse(commandId: String) extends CompletionFailure
  final case class NoStatusInResponse(commandId: String) extends CompletionFailure

  final case class CompletionSuccess(
